(Same as ATHIST 385 1)
THEA 230 pre-requisite is no longer required for this course. Email the instructor at sward6@emory.edu for permission.
course_description: An introduction to the theory and practice of scene design. Includes historical research, script analysis from a visual perspective, and exercises to develop basic design skills.
prerequisites: This course requires THEA 230/DANC 230 or equivalent transfer credit as a prerequisite.
